MOBILEPAGE_SEARCH_WHERE.Statement: WHERE w2_MobilePage.dept_id = @dept_id AND ( (@page_id_like_escaped = '' OR w2_MobilePage.page_id LIKE @page_id_like_escaped + '%' ESCAPE '#') -- ページID AND (@page_name_like_escaped = '' OR w2_MobilePage.page_name LIKE '%' + @page_name_like_escaped + '%' ESCAPE '#') -- ページ名 )

MOBILEPAGE_SEARCH_ORDER_BY.Statement: ORDER BY CASE @sort_kbn WHEN 0 THEN w2_MobilePage.page_id WHEN 2 THEN w2_MobilePage.page_name ELSE '1' END ASC, CASE @sort_kbn WHEN 1 THEN w2_MobilePage.page_id WHEN 3 THEN w2_MobilePage.page_name ELSE '1' END DESC, -- 常に一定の結果セットを得るため、主キー（昇順）ソート w2_MobilePage.dept_id ASC, w2_MobilePage.page_id ASC, w2_MobilePage.career_id ASC, w2_MobilePage.mobile_group_id ASC
